original_title: Iced Earth: Festivals of the Wicked
overview: Festivals of the Wicked is live DVD/CD by the American heavy metal band Iced Earth. Released in 2011, Festivals of the Wicked features three performances by the band; one from 2007, and two from 2008. The DVD/CD was also the last Iced Earth release to feature vocalists Tim "Ripper" Owens and Matt Barlow.
title: Iced Earth: Festivals of the Wicked
